page.title: 18HOME-LIFE.
page.content: The average family consists of four to five people and they live in busy towns and cities. Most families are close-knit though divorce is increasing.The day starts at 7.30 or 8 am. Mother is usually out of bed first to prepare breakfast. Father goes to work, the children go to school or nursery and mother begins her round of household chores - washing dishes, making beds, hoovering, dusting and preparing the evening meal. There are many labour saving devices around the house washing machine, tumble dryers, food processor, dish washer etc. These leave women more free time for leisure activities though more women today are in part or full time jobs. The family returns for meals,talk together and relax.
